name: DeepHarvest VII Ludum Dare 52
description:
Come explore the depths of the ocean and see what you can collect from the wreckage on the ocean floor. Find audio logs to learn the story of what happened to the crew of the underwater geothermal power station as you maneuver your submarine through the remains.

Made within 72 ours or the Ludum Dare Game Jam. A few things had to be cut to make sure to get it in on time but we all had a great time working on it. 

TIPS: 

Everything to find is nearby the large power station. The game won't stop you from wandering off into the distance but there's nothing to find out too far away other than empty ocean. 

Play in the web browser or download for better performance.
